description: Do you need a stopwatch or timer for your Android Wear smartwatch?Simple and intuitive interface with clear design and easy to read digits. Perfect for every situation requiring timing (sports, games, work and of course cooking :) ).Features:- Countdown timer- Predefined egg timer- Start/Stop,- Record lap,- Quick reset, - Lap summary,- Resume time after stopping,- Looks great on your Android Wear device
descriptionHTML:
Do you need a stopwatch or timer for your Android Wear smartwatch?

Simple and intuitive interface with clear design and easy to read digits.

Perfect for every situation requiring timing (sports, games, work and of course cooking :) ).

Features:

- Countdown timer
- Predefined egg timer
- Start/Stop,
- Record lap,
- Quick reset,
- Lap summary,
- Resume time after stopping,
- Looks great on your Android Wear device
comments: Useless. It's not even compatible with circle faced watches, like most smart watches nowadays! You shouldn't ask money for this! Especially without a free test version to try out this app! I'm asking for a refund right now!
